member.name: T:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Error message enum, represent errors was return from serwer, which response status is fail. Use in exception.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.PERMISSIONS_NOT_SUFFICIENT
member.summary: Permisions for public api key, are not sufficient to execute action.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.INVALID_HASH_SIGNATURE
member.summary: The hash query signature (Autorization hash) is invalid.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.RESPONSE_TIMEOUT
member.summary: The response time has been exceeded.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.TIMEOUT
member.summary: Invalid method reference: unsupported parameters, unsupported query type or error in reference to method name.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.ACTION_BLOCKED
member.summary: The action is blocked on the user's account.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.ACTION_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
member.summary: The action call limit has been user, wait one full minut before next call to serwer.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.UNDER_MAINTENANCE
member.summary: Maintenance work or updates are curently underway.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.MARKET_NOT_RECOGNIZED
member.summary: Market code was not recognized.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.TICKER_NOT_FOUND
member.summary: Ticker for market was not found.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.NOT_RECOGNIZED_OFFER_TYPE
member.summary: Not recognized offer type, incorrect name.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.FUNDS_NOT_SUFFICIENT
member.summary: Funds on account's are not sufficient to complete the offer.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.OFFER_FUNDS_NOT_EXCEEDING_MINIMUMS
member.summary: The offer value us less than acceptable minimum value from market ticker.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.OFFER_FUNDS_SCALE_ISSUE
member.summary: The numerical value provided in the query doesn't match the number of decimal places for the currency.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.OFFER_COULD_NOT_BE_FILLED
member.summary: The offer cannot be completed in full, applies to Fill or kill method. There aren't enough offers in the orderbook.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.OFFER_WOULD_HAVE_BEEN_PARTIALLY_FILLED
member.summary: The offer can be realized only in part, applies to Fill or kill method.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.FILL_OR_KILL_COMBINED_WITH_POST_ONLY
member.summary: Used type "fill or kill" from "post only", these parameters cannot be sent together.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.INVALID_RESOLUTION
member.summary: Incorrect resolution parameter value for historic candles.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.OFFER_NOT_FOUND
member.summary: The offer was not found (if offer canceled request).

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.SECONDARY_AMOUNTONLY
member.summary: For maker offer.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.ALLOWED_WITH_MARKET_OFFER
member.summary: Allowed with market offer.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.SELF_TRADING
member.summary: The user has opposite offers in a market.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.PRICE_PRECISION_INVALID
member.summary: Incorrect price precision.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.USER_OFFER_COUNT_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
member.summary: The limit of offers placed on the market has been exhausted (delete one other offer).

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.MARKET_DISABLED
member.summary: The selected market is turned off.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.INVALID_REQUEST
member.summary: The query was constructed incorrectly.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.MALFORMED_REQUEST
member.summary: The JOSN object sent in the query is corrupted.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.MARKET_CODE_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY
member.summary: No market code provided.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.CONFIG_LOAD_TIMEOUT
member.summary: Can not load market configuration.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.SYSTEM_TIMEOUT
member.summary: System response time exceeded.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.CORE_OVERFLOW
member.summary: The trading system has been overloaded.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.SYSTEM_OVERLOADED
member.summary: The stock exchange system is overloaded.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.UNKNOWN_ERROR
member.summary: System unknown error has occurred.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.CONFIG_NOT_FOUND
member.summary: User market configuration not found.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.NOT_SUPPORTED_RESULT
member.summary: The response from the query module is not correct.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.CANNOT_GET_REQUIRED_BALANCE
member.summary: Unable to access user wallet.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.STATS_COULD_NOT_BE_LOADED
member.summary: Makret statistic cannot be loaded.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.BALANCE_NOT_FOUND_OR_INCOMPATIBLE
member.summary: Balance wallet not found or unsupported.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.BALANCE_NOT_FOUND
member.summary: Balance wallet not found.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.INVALID_STOP_RATE
member.summary: StopRate value is invalid - the offer can be realize immedietly. To allow immediate execution set the "ignoreInvalidStopRate" parameter to true.

member.name: F:BitBayClient.ErrorMessage.INVALID_STOP_OFFER_ID
member.summary: Invalid ID for stop offer - the offer with this id does not exist.

member.summary: Private stop trading api method on BitBay stock exchange, for use must autorize user using Public and Private key.

member.summary: Add new stop offer to user account. For use, must authorize User.
member.returns: Offer UUID identificator.

member.summary: Get all active stop offer on exchange. For use, must authorize User.
member.returns: List of active stop offers.

member.name: M:BitBayClient.PrivateStopTrading.GetActiveStopOffer(System.String)
member.summary: Get active stop offer for specif market.
member.returns: List of active stop offers.

member.name: M:BitBayClient.PrivateStopTrading.DeleteStopOffer(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Delete specif offer UUID on specif currency pair. For use, must authorize User.
member.returns: Return true if delete stop offer successful or return false else.

member.name: T:BitBayClient.PrivateTrading
member.summary: Private trading api method on BitBay stock exchange, for use must authorize user using Public and Private key.

member.name: M:BitBayClient.PrivateTrading.AddNewOffer(System.String,BitBayClient.RequestModel.NewOfferRequest)
member.summary: Add new offer, using NewOfferRequest body and sepcif currency pair code. For use, must authorize User.
member.returns: New offer response.
member.exception: Throw on event, the body params was null.

member.name: M:BitBayClient.PrivateTrading.GetAllActiveOffer
member.summary: Get all active offer from stock exchange on user account. For use, must authorize User.
member.returns: List of all active offers.

member.name: M:BitBayClient.PrivateTrading.GetActiveOffer(System.String)
member.summary: Get all active offer from specif market. For use must autorize User.
member.returns: List of all active offers on currencyPair market.

member.name: M:BitBayClient.PrivateTrading.DeleteOffer(System.String,System.String,ExchangeBasicData.TransactionType,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Delete offer from market. For use, must authorize User.
member.param: Offer UUID identificator, geting on offer add.
member.returns: True if offer was deleted succesfull or false else.

member.name: M:BitBayClient.PrivateTrading.GetCommissionsAndConfiguration(System.String)
member.summary: Get commisions and configuration assinged to the account. For use, must authorize User.
member.returns: Commision and configuration data object.

member.name: M:BitBayClient.PrivateTrading.ChangeConfiguration(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Change default ballance on market. For use, must authorize User. Pair build first-second, for example BTC-USD btc is first, usd is second.
member.param: Balance UUID for first currency in pair.
Balance UUID for second currency in pair
member.returns: Return true if change configuration successful or return false else.

member.name: T:BitBayClient.PublicTrading
member.summary: Public trading method on BitBay stock exchange.

member.name: M:BitBayClient.PublicTrading.GetTicker(System.String)
member.summary: Get ticker for selected market.
member.param: Currency pair with dash, example BTC-USD
member.returns: Ticker for selected market. Return "ticker" atribut from api response.

member.name: M:BitBayClient.PublicTrading.GetAllTicker
member.summary: Get ticker for all market on stock exchange.
member.returns: Dictionary where key is market code, value is ticker for this market code. Return "ticker" atribut from api response.

member.name: M:BitBayClient.PublicTrading.GetMarketStats(System.String)
member.summary: Get 24 hours market stats for selected currency pair.
member.returns: 24 hours stats for currency pair. Return "stats" list from response.

member.name: M:BitBayClient.PublicTrading.GetAllMarketStats
member.summary: Get 24 hours market stats for all market on stock exchange.
member.returns: Dictionary where key is currency pair code, value is stats for key market. Return "stats" list from response.

member.name: M:BitBayClient.PublicTrading.GetOrderbook(System.String)
member.summary: Get orderbook with 300 higher buy and 300 lowest sell offers, from rest api.
member.param: Currency pair code, format example: BTC-USD.
member.returns: Orderbook with 300 higher buy and 300 lowest sell offers.

member.name: M:BitBayClient.PublicTrading.GetOrderbook(System.String,BitBayClient.RequestModel.OrderbookLimits)
member.summary: Get orderbook with own limit of sell and buy offers, from rest api.
member.param: Limit of offer count (available limits: 10, 50, 100). Limit must be less or equal 300.
member.returns: Orderbook with own limit offers of buy and sell.

member.name: M:BitBayClient.PublicTrading.GetLastTransactions(System.String)
member.summary: Get last 10 transaction. Return list from "items" property in api response.
member.returns: List of last transactions, list count 10.

member.name: M:BitBayClient.PublicTrading.GetLastTransactions(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get last limit count transaction. Return list from "items" property in api response.
member.returns: List of last transactions, list count is limited by limit (max 300).
member.exception: Throw if the limit is greater than 300.

member.name: M:BitBayClient.PublicTrading.GetLastTransactions(System.String,System.Int64)
member.summary: Get last transaction, start from unixtimestamp. Return list from "items" property in api response.
member.param: Unix timestam from start geting result.
member.returns: List of last transactions, started from unix timestamp.

member.name: M:BitBayClient.PublicTrading.GetLastTransactions(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int64)
member.summary: Get last limit count transaction. Return list from "items" property in api response.
member.param: Unix timestam from start geting result.
member.returns: List of last transactions, started from unix timestamp and limited by limit.
member.exception: Throw if the limit is greater than 300.

member.name: M:BitBayClient.PublicTrading.GetCandlesData(System.String,ExchangeBasicData.CandleResolution,System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Get all candles with specif resolution for selected currencyPair, start result "fromTimeUnix" and end in "toTimeUnix". For get one candle time from and time to must be the same.
member.param: Currency pair code string, example BTC-USD.
Unix timestamp from start geting candles.
Unix timestamp to end geting candles.
member.returns: Candles data object.
member.exception: Throw if "fromTimeUnix" is great than "toTimeUnix". From time must be before to time.
